scripts.start-remote-server: docker-compose -f remote-build/docker-compose-server.yml up && npm run start-angular && npm run start-react
scripts.reset-docker: docker-compose -f remote-build/docker-compose-worker.yml down && docker-compose -f remote-build/docker-compose-server.yml down && docker-compose -f frontend/docker-compose-angular.yml down && docker-compose -f frontend/docker-compose-react.yml down
